item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 24, 2024 at 12:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ex-tabloid publisher says he sought to shield Trump from infidelity claims
2. Dimon cautions over soft landing for ‘unbelievable’ US economy
3. Investors price in growing chance of another Fed interest rate rise
4.  The White House knows that the global south has a point
5. Goldman Sachs moves senior banker to Paris in post-Brexit revamp
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 24, 2024 at 12:00 AM UTC
